import React, { useState } from "react"; import formApi from "../services/formApi"; export default function FormEditModal({ form, onClose, onSave }) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ ...form }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const handleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); setError(null); try { const { data } = await formApi.updateForm(`/${form.id}`, formData); onSave(data); window.location.reload(); } catch (err) { console.error(err); setError(err.response?.data?.error || "Failed to update form"); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (
